verbose_text: Proteins that encoded potential toxin / antitoxin systems that could function in GEI stabilization included : a protein with a PIN (PilT N terminus) domain, two Fic/Doc (Filamentation induced by cAMP / Death on curing)-like proteins and the OLD protein / UvrD pair (Overcome lysogeny defect/UV repair).
evidence: induced by cAMP/Death on curing)-like proteins and the OLD protein
